text:
(1)
Farming in the Bronx: A pastoral scene near one of the borough's leading thoroughfares. This goat is gazing at East Gunhill Road between Barnes and Hickory Avenues.
Autumn 1923.

P. L. Sperr

(2)
A similar scene near Van Cortlandt Park. Probably near Jerome Avenue and Bedford Park Blvd.
P.L. Sperr

(3)
Reposing under the elevated structure of the I.R.T. subway line near Van Cortlandt Park is another member of the same species. Probably near Jerome Avenue and Bedford Park Blvd.
Autumn 1923.

P. L. Sperr
title: Farming in the Bronx.
